title: [Large-scale] Strategies for Enhancing Language Education Outcomes in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience utilizing digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Operating role-playing simulations and real-time feedback systems using VR in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously complete language practice modules in a blended learning environment with an 80% or higher completion rate.
Learners can improve their language proficiency (speaking/listening) by 25% compared to baseline assessments through online-offline interactions.
Learners can compose and incorporate peer feedback at least three times using Learning Management System (LMS) tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
